channel.title: Posts on r-w-x Nicholas
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on r-w-x Nicholas

item.title: Getting Started in Tech Youtube Playlist
item.description: There is a ton of information out there regarding how to get a job in technology. As an attempt to consolidate that, I’m going to be starting a YouTube playlist of videos that are of high quality on how to get a job in tech.

item.title: Read, Write, Execute
item.description: I have long held the feeling that my university education has limited me to what my university thinks what businesses want, not what businesses need. I think I found a way to fix that.

item.title: The Unnecessary Tide Pod problem
item.description: I’m going to be answering the question no one has asked: How many tide pods will I need for the rest of my life?

item.title: Library Abuse
item.description: Libraries are the best institute to abuse for your benefit. And they encourage it!

item.title: Hello World
item.description: This is my first post on this blog
